titleInfo.title: Founders of Life and Casualty Insurance Company, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.

mods.identifier: Jerry Parker L&C photos f2 founders 001

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Founders of Life and Casualty Insurance Company, pictured top left, Mr. Guilford Dudley, Sr., serving from 1903 to 1945; center, Mr. A.M. Burton, serving from 1903 to 1966; top right, Mr. P.M. Estes, Sr., serving from 1903 to 1947; lower left, Dr. J.C. Franklin, serving from 1903 to 1922, and lower right, Mrs. Helena Haralson Johnson, serving from 1903 to 1935. Forms part of the Jerry Parker, Life and Casualty Insurance Company Collection. 1 b & w photograph.

titleInfo.title: Jerry Parker, Life and Casualty Insurance Company Collection
